channel.title: How can I add
channel.description: I would like to add agility and farming to my devolution 7.0 server!!! Does someone knows how to add it??? The only thing I know for agility is that you when you click on a object you tele to the other place and you receives xp's :p But for farming I don't know how to give items when you click on an objet :s

item.title: How can I add
item.dc:creator: @Stefun8 Stefun8
item.description:
@Stefun8 wrote:

Okay thanks but the next time but it between :p I tried it but it won’t work

Read full topic

item.title: How can I add
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Here’s my code of Agility. Just copy and paste this in client.java under “Switch (ObjectID)”

//Gnome Course:
case 2295:
addSkillXP(50, 16);
sendMessage(“You cross the log Safely.”);
pEmote = 770;
teleportToX = 2474;
teleportToY = 3429;
break;
//Squeeze pipes:
case 4058:
addSkillXP(150, 16);
sendMessage(“You squeeze through the pipe.”);
pEmote = 746;
teleportToX = 2486;
teleportToY = 3438;
break;
case 2285:
addSkillXP(200, 16);
sendMessage(“You climb up the wall.”);
pEmote = 839;
teleportToX = 2473;
teleportToY = 3424;
heightLevel = 1;
break;
//Climb up Wall:
case 2287:
addSkillXP(250, 16);
sendMessage(“You climb up the tree.”);
pEmote = 839;
teleportToX = 2473;
teleportToY = 3420;
heightLevel = 2;
break;
//Cross TightRope:
case 2312:
addSkillXP(300, 16);
sendMessage(“You cross the rope safely.”);
pEmote = 770;
teleportToX = 2483;
teleportToY = 3420;
break;
//Climb Down:
case 2315:
addSkillXP(250, 16);
sendMessage(“You climb down the tree.”);
pEmote = 839;
teleportToX = 2485;
teleportToY = 3419;
heightLevel = -2;
break;
//Climb Over Wall:
case 2286:
addSkillXP(300, 15);
sendMessage(“You climb over the obstacle.”);
pEmote = 839;
teleportToX = 2485;
teleportToY = 3427;
break;
//end of agility

Read full topic

item.title: How can I add
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

ok, search for ‘case ID’

  1. you need the ‘Object ID’ of the agility thing,
    2)go to case and type:
    case OBJECT ID;
    {
    //stuff to do in here
    }

it will do what eva is inbetween the 2 curly brackets, when the user clicks on the object
hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: How can I add
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Here is an example of clicking a cannon and making it take cannon balls away, and add coins, and also add farming experience to the players account.

if(objectID == 6){ sendMessage("You load the cannon balls into the cannon."); addItem(995, 50); deleteItem(2, 30); addSkillXP((950*playerLevel[19]), 19); sendMessage("The cannon fires and magically gives you farming experience."); sendMessage("Wait, what?"); }
[hr]
Search for something with if(objectID if you find something like that place it under the last }.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I add
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

if(objectID == #){ sendMessage("#"); addItem(#, #); }

Change the first # to the object ID that you are going to click for the actions to happen.
Change the second # to the message you want it to send to the player, as obvious it says ‘sendMessage’.
Change the third and fourth #'s to the item ID and item amount that is going to be given to the player, if you want to delete items I think it’s the same way but using deleteItem.

Read full topic
